jobAccomplishments.content: Researched, investigated and recorded and recorded more than 20 audio interviews on behalf of CNN US for a travel series
Transcribed audio interviews and rough cuts of podcast episodes for Gimlet Media and A&E Network.

Wrote 3 pieces for hyperlocal publication City Matters on Westminster and the City of London, covering local elections, politics and religion.
Worked at WNYC for a month (Dec 2017-Jan 2018)

Set up piece, did interviews, did pre-interviews, was interviewed by Morning Edition using self-authored script and had work aired and published by WNYC
